Description.0: One of the smallest of the new type of star class ships.
Description.1: The topaz was incredibly powerful when compared to its contempary destroyers.
Description.2: The ship featured the unique long range lightning cannon that was exclucive to the new star classes.
Description.3: Due to their power, many of these ships served solo roles in defence and exploration.
Description.4: As such they could tangle with battleships of the younger empires with ease.
